title: Sans with Odd K and D
content:
Hi Folks,

I received this sample for an ID, and I have not been able to pin it down. I've searched my Sans Guide and Dafont, and even attempted using Identifont with no success.

Anyone know what this is?

Thanks for your help,  
- Mike

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20120710222143im_/http:/typophile.com/files/SimpleSans_3429.gif)
author: bowfinpw

comments.content:
I suspect this as coming from a small (independent) source, though apparently not one that is on Dafont.

- Mike Yanega

Interesting find.

Closest I can think of is Nobel Condensed, but still far off.
